title: Provides for the de-regulation of rent-stabilized housing accommodations
summary: Relates to the de-regulation of rent-stabilized housing accommodations; eliminates rent regulation for any regulated housing accommodation that becomes vacant on or after June 16, 2012; makes exceptions.
